about_the_game:
Dr Livingstone, I Presume? OST contains music composed exclusively for the game.

The vibrations of the African Strange House will take you on a journey through the main story of the game - from spellbinding exploration to tough realization on what happened to Livingstone - your friend and mentor. Close your eyes and relive the adventure. In your own way.
